name: Zenza
description: Zenza is a calming yet strategic puzzle game based off of Kigo Haiku, a form of Japanese poems thematically relating to the seasons. Put colors or shapes together to achieve balance. Progress through increasingly challenging levels to perfect your zen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i3 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 2.5Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 520 Storage: 350 MB available space
